1: <pb/><t>Dios, to'l wech,</t> <t>¡Chinch'abej la</t> <t>aretak quinsiq'uin che la!</t> <t>Ri lal</t> <t>chi chupam ri nu rikoj c'ax xinto' la.</t> <t>¡Chtok'obisaj la nu wäch</t> <t>chtatabej la ri nu ch'awem!</t>
2: <pb/><t>Ix ri quina' iwib</t> <t>chi ix nimak tak tatayib.</t> <t>¿C'ä jampa' quitanaba' u yok'ic</t> <t>ri nu juluwem?</t> <t>¿C'ä jampa' lo ri quirayij na</t> <t>xukuje' qui tzucuj na</t> <t>ri man c'o ta u beya'l,</t> <t>ri xa subunic?</t>
3: <t>Chiwetamaj chi ri Ajawaxel</t> <t>are cäbe ranima'</t> <t>ruc' ri winak ri jic cäbin chuwäch;</t> <t>chiwetamaj chi ri Ajawaxel quinutatabej</t> <t>aretak quinsiq'uij.</t>
4: <t>¡Chixbirbitok; mixmacun chic!</t> <t>Aretak ix k'oyol chic, pa tz'inelem,</t> <t>chinic'oj ri kas iwetambal c'uxaj;</t>
5: <t>chebichi'j jicalaj tak tabal tok'ob</t> <t>chicu'ba' i c'u'x chrij ri Ajawaxel.</t>
6: <pb/><t>E q'ui quebinic:</t> <t>“¿Jachin ri cac'utuw na chkawäch</t> <t>ri takalic?”</t> <t>¡Ajawaxel, chujila' la</t> <t>cuc' ri e utzalaj tak bak'wäch la!</t>
7: <t>Nim na ri quicotemal ri yo'm la</t> <t>chupam ri wanima'</t> <t>chquiwäch ri c'o q'uialaj qui trico</t> <t>xukuje' u wa'l qui uva ruc' tz'ebenic.</t>
8: <pb/><t>In quink'oyi' pa jamaril</t> <t>chanim c'ut cäc'amtaj nu waram,</t> <t>lal c'ut Ajawaxel,</t> <t>caban la chwe</t> <t>chi quinjeki' pa cu'bisan c'uxaj.</t>
